summary: The diff does not show any change that adds the specified Internet Identity principal to the backend admin allowlist used by AccessControl. The only visible backend excerpt includes AccessControl initialization and unrelated authorization checks; no allowlist/principal update is evidenced. Additionally, project_state.json was modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the Internet Identity principal `ih4li-2xvzb-eiqhx-p746g-mfu4p-qceq3-iq7li-gh4d2-3ajo4-qldaw-iqe` to the backend admin allowlist used by the AccessControl system so this principal is recognized as an admin by `AccessControl.isAdmin(...)` / `isCallerAdmin()` and can access `/admin`.
missing_requirements.reason: In the provided (truncated) backend/main.mo diff, there is no evidence of the specified principal being added to any admin allowlist or AccessControl state configuration; only generic permission checks and AccessControl initialization are shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state (e.g., projectStateVersion and/or feature listings) in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to add a principal to the backend admin allowlist; it does not request any changes to project_state.json.
